SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, mfg_coverage_id, ext_warranty, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, mfg_coverage_ext_id FROM elp_mfg_coverage_ext WHERE mfg_coverage_ext_id = :mfg_coverage_ext_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT elp_mfg_coverage_ext.mfg_coverage_ext_id, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.dealer_id, elp_dealer.dealer_name, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.mfg_coverage_id, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.ext_warranty, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.created_by, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.created_date, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.modified_by, elp_mfg_coverage_ext.modified_date FROM elp_mfg_coverage_ext, elp_dealer WHERE elp_mfg_coverage_ext.mfg_coverage_id = :mfg_coverage_id and elp_dealer.dealer_id = elp_mfg_coverage_ext.dealer_id order by dealer_name
SQL.GET_AVAILABLE_DEALERS: select d.dealer_id, d.dealer_name from elp_dealer d, elp_company c where d.company_id = c.company_id and c.company_group_id = :company_group_id and ( NOT d.dealer_id in (select dealer_id from elp_mfg_coverage_ext mce, elp_mfg_coverage mc where mce.mfg_coverage_id = mc.mfg_coverage_id and mc.mfg_coverage_id = :mfg_coverage_id and d.company_id = c.company_id and c.company_group_id = mc.company_group_id ) --dynamic_where_clause ) order by d.dealer_name
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_mfg_coverage_ext SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, mfg_coverage_id = :mfg_coverage_id, ext_warranty = :ext_warranty, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE mfg_coverage_ext_id = :mfg_coverage_ext_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_mfg_coverage_ext ( dealer_id, mfg_coverage_id, ext_warranty, created_by, mfg_coverage_ext_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :mfg_coverage_id, :ext_warranty, :created_by, :mfg_coverage_ext_id )
